Name: Fruit of the Netherworld
Description: A dark fruit from the depths of the underworld; there are many tales warning the dangers of eating this fruit. You can feel an infernal power coursing beneath its skin like a heartbeat; it is paradoxically unsettling and alluring at the same time. The color and aroma of this fruit are so inviting, and its succulent flesh radiates faintly with a dark light. Surely the foreboding tales of this item are exaggerated...A single bite couldn't be all that dangerous...
